productInformation.value: 4.2 4.2 out of 5 stars 43 ratings 4.2 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A perfect pairing of home theater products for an unmatched cinematic experience. The Home Theater Bundle at a glance: We start with an award-winning laser TV projector. The Formovie Theater is the wildly popular US version of the Fengmi T1 4K UHD UST projector. Loved by customers for its long list of features and competitive price, it comes loaded with the Android OS and a full color management system for ultimate control over your cinematic experience. Then, we pair it with best ALR screen on the market. The Spectra Projection Vantage is the discerning user's choice for high-quality projection. Cutting-edge ambient light rejecting technology provides a sharper 4K picture and incredible visuals for a more immersive viewing experience.

Formovie Theater: The Proven Best Triple Laser Ultra Short Throw Projector Judged by an independent panel of industry experts and hosted by Projector Central and ProjectorScreen.com, the Formovie Theater has taken home the 1st Place Award at the Projector Central / ProjectorScreen.com Laser TV Showdown for the past two years in a row, a testament to its best-in-class performance and incredible value.

4K UHD Resolution Enjoy a stunning, crystal-clear 4K movie theater experience at 4x greater resolution than 1080p. Over 1 Billion Colors The triple laser design of the Formovie Theater allows for a wider color gamut than perceptible by the human eye for the most vivid imagery. Ultra Short Throw & Large Projection Formovie THEATER has a throw ratio of 0.23:1, enabling it to throw a 100” projection with an ultra short throw distance of just 9”. Its maximum projection size is 150”.

MEMC for Smooth Motion There is no need to worry about smearing and blurring with high-speed motion pictures, like sports. Get smooth images, even in slow motion. Dolby Atmos Certified The cinema-level standard ensures a striking cinema experience. Coupled with speakers by Bowers & Wilkins to provide you the best audio in any UST projector. Cutting Edge Gaming Experience Reduce latency and increase transfer rate to ensure the best experience for high-action, fast-paced games. Complete Connectivity With Android TV plus a wide array of ports for easy connection with and use of devices, Formovie is the perfect centerpiece for any entertainment system.

Formovie Theater Technical Specifications Brightness 2,800 Lumens Contrast Ratio Over 3,000:1 Audio Premium Audio w/ Dolby Atmos HDR Supported Dolby Vision, HDR10+, HDR10 Color Gamut BT.2020 WiFi Wifi 6 2.4/5GHz Operating System Certified Android TV 11.0 Awards ProjectorScreen.com's "Top Pick" 2023 Screenie Award; ProjectorScreen.com's "Top Pick" 2022 Screenie Award; 1st Place - Laser TV Showdown 2022 Award for UST Triple-Laser Projectors Resolution 4K UHD Controls Remote, Voice
Spectra Vantage vs Matte White Screens The Spectra Vantage UST is 0.5 gain, ideal for UST projection in order to prevent hot-spots, negate off-axis ambient light and provide deep, dark black levels.

Stunning Visuals Any Time Of Day Thanks to the ambient light rejecting screen surface, the Spectra Vantage lets you enjoy films and TV shows any time of day. Even in well lit rooms! This 4K surface material is formulated to sustain excellent color reproduction and contrast for enhanced picture quality in environments with little control over room lighting. Luxury Craftsmanship That Won’t Break The Bank The Spectra Vantage is well built with style and function in mind. The luxurious black velvet frame doesn’t just provide a touch of class to this affordable projector screen, it also serves to better absorb overflow light making it easier to align your UST projector and cinema screen. Precision mitering gives the frame perfectly fitting 45 degree corners for a perfect fit that’s easy to assemble, no unsightly cap connectors on this screen. Innovative six-layer optical structure Say goodbye to unsightly ghosting and mirror reflections. The Spectra Vantage consists of multiple layers of projection media to protect your device and provide the best possible viewing experience. ALR technology shields surrounding light sources other than your projector, leading to a vivid, natural presentation that looks great evening in natural lighting. Thin design for easy setup and immersive viewing The 0.47-inch edge gives the screen an even wider appearance so you can better dive into your favorite movies, shows and video games.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing image quality
reviews.reviewText: This is an amazing projector with great contrast, resolution and black levels. I own a newer oled and this doesn't feel very far behind it which is remarkable. I use a receiver with speakers so can't speak to it's sound but Arc works well. The color is also great out of the box, but I'm sure calibration would improve it further. There are jaw dropping moments with this projector when the visuals are exceedingly great. Highly recommend getting the Formovie if you are looking for a UST.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 4k Short Throw Projector
reviews.reviewText: After doing lot of research finally decided to buy this projector. Generally we see projectors from other reputed brands like epson, LG, samsung etc. sold in electronic stores. You see this projector being sold there. But if you do some research, you will get to know about this projector being talked about mostly on reddit and other forums and on YouTube.ProsThe quality of picture is amazing(especially when you watch 4k and 8k content). I was initially looking for an oled tv, but since my room bigger decided to go with the projector and picture quality wise it came very close to meeting my expectations.The sounds of this projector is crisp. For this price range the projector is worth the money.ConsThe app is bit slow and sluggish. The remote could have been better. The remote doesn't come with batteries, so make sure you have couple of AAA batteries. If your room has ambient light, you may need to spend some money buying ALR screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT product, even better support
reviews.reviewText: i ordered the projector, and when i turned it on, it was love at first sight. I was blown away (still am) by the amazing quality of picture and performance. Sadly, there was a technical issue but that only enhanced my experience (if that’s possible), the entire return process was smooth, i had a replacement unit 2 days later AND it was personally tested by their team. Money has been refunded, and i got EXACTLY what i wanted from the product, and the company. HIGHLY recommended and you can trust the reviews on the quality of the projector and the team. 5 star

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It won the 2022 UST projector shootout
reviews.reviewText: Coming from a 75" tv that was loaded with Dolby Vision, 120hz, VRR, and ALLM, this projector really surprised me. I did my due diligence before I made my purchase and did what I think was too much research. For the cost out of the box, thing is pretty impressive. And then you start to tweak the settings and it really comes alive! I paired it with an ALR/CLR screen that's 103" from Elite Screens, and wow did my movies and gaming come to life in a big way. I haven't had any problems with the setup or use, so I cannot comment on the customer service of Formovie, but from other reviews I've read, it's pretty top notch. My only complaint is that the remote isn't backlit, but once it's setup if you are using any kind of programmable universal remote, you shouldn't need it. If you're on the fence about going to a UST over a tv, for the cost you're never going to find a tv that does what this UST does up to 150". I'm glad I went with this one for my home theater setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great beautiful projector but….
reviews.reviewText: The images that it produces is so beautiful with nice contrast post calibration. The major con is the absolute abyssmal remote that flakes and completely dies. For such an expensive projector, the remote is pure garbage. This is our 7th time unpairing and pairing. Sometimes you have to reboot the entire projector as well. Now we have to spend more money for a functional remote.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars A great projector with some quirks
reviews.reviewText: I am not going to write about something which everyone knows.it's a great projector at this price point. The Out of box colour settings are off and is very blue-biased but with proper calibration settings, you can get it to work like a charm.The only thing which really gets on my nerves is false advertising and claims. It says on the box that it supports HDR10 +, but that is not the case as I tried everything, and HDR 10 + does not work. What it does it decodes it to HDR 10. This does not work well with me in terms of false advertising and claims.How is Formovie taking proper action against this fiasco of a problem is my main question.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Formovie theater won the 2022 UST showdown and I can see why! This has been amazing for the short time I had it! Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this projector!! It's super bright and the colors really pop!

reviews.reviewTitle: Meilleur ultra courte focale de marché
reviews.reviewText: Après avec essayé un jmgo N1 Ultra qui ne correspondait par complètement à mes attentes, le formovie theater est clairement un excellent produit.Ne souhaitant pas disposer d'un écran spécialisé qui occuperait le mur de mon salon, je l'utilise sur un mur blanc. Et la qualité est malgré tout extraordinaire.Sur mur blanc, il peut être utilisé la journée mais il esr préférable de ne pas avoir une fenêtre directement à côté et qui apporterait trop de lumière. Néanmoins, ça marche plutot bien malgré tout.Le plein potentiel se passe donc en soirée où les couleurs sont pratiquement dignes d'un Oled pour en avoir posséder 2 par le passé. Les noirs sont très corrects également pour un vidéoprojecteur.Le son bower et wilkins qui accepte le dolby Atmos et dts:x est de très bonne facture également et permet de ne pas avoir obligatoirement une barre de son.Même si un peu de basses en plus serait appréciable.Après avoir testé le jmgo et posséder plusieurs tv oled, je ne regrette pas cet achat qui me permet de regarder des films en 150" au maximum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Better than those available from the ‘big’ brands.
reviews.reviewText: Paired with a VividStorm S Pro motorised tension rising screen. I’m extremely happy with the quality and ease of use. Basically now have a discreet, but proper home cinema. Dolby vision and good B&W sound built in (although I do use external amp and speakers). Perfect.
